pages.text: Refractory bricks are the basic building blocks of some machines. The process begins by smelting a clay brick, which are obtained through simple crafting. $(br2)A clay brick can be made more efficiently by right clicking a clay block with the iron scraper.
Bricks can be crafted back into two individual brick (shapeless).
